Plot: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.
Title: Cape Fear
Writer: John D. MacDonald (novel), James R. Webb (earlier screenplay), Wesley Strick (screenplay)
Actors: Robert De Niro, Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange, Juliette Lewis
tomatoConsensus: Smart and stylish, Cape Fear is a gleefully mainstream shocker from Martin Scorsese, with a terrifying Robert De Niro peformance.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 14 nominations.
